long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever a problem with finding your old important talks? I had sometimes the  problem, especially when I couldn't find business conversation, clients, partners or even a friend which I sent something long time ago or I was colaborating with, etc.

It's hard to find that person you're looking for them in this huge chat's forest.

You can help yourself by preventing this problem. Just create a tag in this extension and push your contact into it, then you can easly sort and filter conversations in messenger GUI or extension' GUI


🄰🅃🅃🄴🄽🅃🄸🄾🄽❕
1. This application is in BETA, if you see some problems, please send us email: axios.programming@gmail.com
2. You have 20 free tags, so if you need to tag more people, then you must buy monthly PREMIUM subscription for around 1 euro ( chatsorted.com )

🄵🄴🄰🅃🅄🅁🄴🅂 🄲🄾🄾🄼🄸🄽🄶 🅂🄾🄾🄽

1. For business users, we will implement Facebook Pages API, so it may help you nurture leads.
2. Automatic/Planned Facebook Pages messages.
